22 class MicroUnroller {
23  std::string m_sName;
24 
25  Abstraction* m_pAbstraction;
26  Abstraction*
27  m_pUAbstraction; // currently we are only able to handle one valid Uabs
28

31  unsigned m_nFrames;
32 
34  std::unordered_map<Node*, int, decltype(&nodeHash), decltype(&nodeEqual)>
35  m_mInputIndices;
37  std::vector<z3::expr> m_vPrimaryInputs;
38 
40  std::unordered_map<Node*, unsigned, decltype(&nodeHash), decltype(&nodeEqual)>
41  m_mStateIndices;

66 public:
67  MicroUnroller(const char* suffix, Abstraction& abs, Abstraction& uabs,
68  z3::context& c, z3::solver& s, bool InitCond)
69  : m_sName(suffix), m_pAbstraction(&abs), m_pUAbstraction(&uabs),
70  m_pContext(&c), m_pSolver(&s), m_nFrames(0),
71  m_mInputIndices(NUM_HASHTABLE_BUCKETS, nodeHash, nodeEqual),
72  m_mStateIndices(NUM_HASHTABLE_BUCKETS, nodeHash, nodeEqual) {
73  newFrame();
74  debug = false;
75  setup2Frames(InitCond);
76  }
77 
78  ~MicroUnroller() { reset(NULL); }
79 
81  void reset(z3::solver* solver) {
82  m_vPrimaryInputs.clear();
83  m_vOutputs.clear();
84 
85  m_Assumps.clear();
86 
87  m_nFrames = 0;
88 
89  if (solver) {
90  m_pSolver = solver;
91  newFrame();
92  }
93  }
94 
96  void addAssump(z3::expr& a) { m_Assumps.push_back(a); }
97 
99  std::vector<z3::expr>& getAssumps() { return m_Assumps; }
100 
101  unsigned frame() { return m_nFrames - 1; }
102 
103  void newFrame() {
104  m_nFrames++;
105  m_vOutputs.resize(m_nFrames);
106  }
107 
108  unsigned frames() { return m_nFrames; }
109 
110  unsigned addPrimaryInput(z3::expr in) {
111  unsigned idx = m_vPrimaryInputs.size();
112  m_vPrimaryInputs.push_back(in);
113  return idx;
114  }
115 
116  // inputs are only at 0
117  z3::expr& getPrimaryInput(int nNum) { return m_vPrimaryInputs[nNum]; }
118  z3::expr& getPrimaryInput(Node* var) {
119  auto pos = m_mInputIndices.find(var);
120  ILA_ASSERT(pos != m_mInputIndices.end(), "Unable to find var in input.");
121  return getPrimaryInput(pos->second);
122  }
123 
124  std::vector<z3::expr>& getPrimaryInputs() { return m_vPrimaryInputs; }
125 
126  unsigned addOutput(z3::expr out) {
127  unsigned idx = m_vOutputs.at(frame()).size();
128  m_vOutputs.at(frame()).push_back(out);
129  return idx;
130  }
131 
132  z3::expr& getOutput(Node* var) {
133  auto pos = m_mStateIndices.find(var);
134  ILA_ASSERT(pos != m_mStateIndices.end(), "Unable to find var in map.");
135  return getOutput(frame(), pos->second);
136  }
137 
138  z3::expr& getOutput(unsigned nFrame, Node* var) {
139  auto pos = m_mStateIndices.find(var);
140  ILA_ASSERT(pos != m_mStateIndices.end(), "Unable to find var in map.");
141  return getOutput(nFrame, pos->second);
142  }
143 
144  z3::expr& getOutput(unsigned nFrame, int nNum) {
145  return m_vOutputs.at(nFrame)[nNum];
146  }
147 
148  std::vector<z3::expr>& getOutputs(unsigned nFrame) {
149  return m_vOutputs.at(nFrame);
150  }
151  std::vector<std::vector<z3::expr>>& getAllOutputs() { return m_vOutputs; }
152
